fullDescription.intro: Slice iterator, each iteration processes one image slice. Only ImgPlus and Labelings columns are processed. All images/labelings in one row must have the same dimensions. The order of the columns must not be modified within the loop processing. The end of the loop is the slice collector loop end node.
fullDescription.option: Selection of columns to take into account.
